details.purpose: *To record details about one single menstrual cycle. (en)
details.use: *Use to record details about one single menstrual cycle. (en)
details.misuse:
*Not to be used to record the Last menstrual period (LMP) use the EVALUATION.last_menstrual_period archetype for this purpose.
Not to be used to record information about a specific day in a menstrual cycle, use OBSERVATION.menstrual_diary for this purpose.
Not to be used to record details about menarche or menopause - use the EVALUATION.menstruation_summary archetype for this purpose.
Not to be used to record information about an individual's menstruation history events or patterns of menstruation over time, use EVALUATION.menstruation_summary for this purpose. (en)

details.purpose: For å registrere detaljer om én menstruasjonssyklus.
details.use: Brukes for å registrere detaljer om én menstruasjonssyklus.
details.misuse:
Brukes ikke for å registrere dato for siste menstruasjon, bruk arketypen EVALUATION.last_menstrual_period til dette formålet.
Brukes ikke for å registrere informasjon om en spesifikk dag i menstruasjonssyklusen, bruk arketypen OBSERVATION.menstrual_diary til dette formålet.
Brukes ikke for å registrere detaljer om menarke eller overgangsalder - bruk arketypen EVALUATION.menstruation_summary for dette formålet.
Brukes ikke for å registrere informasjon om typiske eller vanlige menstruasjonssykluser eller mønstre - bruk arketypen EVALUATION.menstruation_summary for dette formålet.

details.purpose: *To record details about one single menstrual cycle. (en)
details.use: *Use to record details about one single menstrual cycle. (en)
details.misuse:
*Not to be used to record the Last menstrual period (LMP) use the EVALUATION.last_menstrual_period archetype for this purpose.
Not to be used to record information about a specific day in a menstrual cycle, use OBSERVATION.menstrual_diary for this purpose.
Not to be used to record details about menarche or menopause - use the EVALUATION.menstruation_summary archetype for this purpose.
Not to be used to record information about an individual's menstruation history events or patterns of menstruation over time, use EVALUATION.menstruation_summary for this purpose. (en)

details.purpose: To record details about one single menstrual cycle.
details.use: Use to record details about one single menstrual cycle.
details.misuse:
Not to be used to record the Last menstrual period (LMP) use the EVALUATION.last_menstrual_period archetype for this purpose.
Not to be used to record information about a specific day in a menstrual cycle, use OBSERVATION.menstrual_diary for this purpose.
Not to be used to record details about menarche or menopause - use the EVALUATION.menstruation_summary archetype for this purpose.
Not to be used to record information about an individual's menstruation history events or patterns of menstruation over time, use EVALUATION.menstruation_summary for this purpose.

details.purpose: Vastleggen van details met betrekking tot één menstruatie cyclus
details.use: Te gebruiken voor het vastleggen van details met betrekking tot één menstruatie cyclus
details.misuse: Niet gebruiken voor het vastleggen van de Laatste Menstruatie Cyclus, gebruik hiervoor het EVALUATION.last_menstrual_period archetype Niet gebruiken voor het vastleggen van informatie over een specifieke dag binnen een menstruatie periode, gebruik hiervoor OBSERVATION.menstrual_diary Niet gebruiken voor het vastleggen van details over de eerste menstruatie of menopauze - gebruik hiervoor EVALUATION.menstruation_summary archetype Niet gebruiken voor het vastleggen van informatie over de menstruatie historie van een individu of menstruatie patroon in de loop van de tijd, gebruik hiervoor EVALUATION.menstruation_summary

items.items: Details about one single menstrual cycle.
Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.
Date of onset of menstrual bleeding in a single cycle.
Duration of menstrual bleeding in this cycle.
Narrative description of the menstrual cycle.
For example midcycle bleeding or deviation from a typical cycle.
Subjective assessment about the menstrual bleeding for the cycle, relative to typical cycles.
Blood clots occurred during the menstrual flow.
Blood clots did not occur during the menstrual flow.
Additional details about the menstrual cycle.
Confounding factors that may affect the menstruation.

For example: stress, hormonal contraception, postnatal period, perimenopausal or HRT use, known fibroids, IUD contraception (non-hormonal) or medications. Coding with a terminology is preferred, where possible.
Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.
For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR.
Additional narrative about the menstrual cycle, not captured in other fields.
*Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time. (en)
Data de início do sangramento menstrual num único ciclo.
Duração do sangramento menstrual num único ciclo de duração típica ou ao longo de muitos ciclos.
*For example midcycle bleeding or deviation from a typical cycle. (en)
*Subjective assessment about the menstrual bleeding for the cycle, relative to typical cycles. (en)
*Blood clots occurred during the menstrual flow.(en)
*Blood clots did not occur during the menstrual flow.(en)
*Confounding factors that may affect the menstruation. (en)

*For example: stress, hormonal contraception, postnatal period, perimenopausal or HRT use, known fibroids, IUD contraception (non-hormonal) or medications. Coding with a terminology is preferred, where possible. (en)
*Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
*For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR. (en)
*Additional narrative about the menstrual cycle, not captured in other fields. (en)
*Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time. (en)
Kuukautisvuodon kesto yksittäisessä kierrossa tai tyypillinen kesto useita kiertoja tarkasteltaessa.
*For example midcycle bleeding or deviation from a typical cycle. (en)
*Subjective assessment about the menstrual bleeding for the cycle, relative to typical cycles. (en)
*Blood clots occurred during the menstrual flow.(en)
*Blood clots did not occur during the menstrual flow.(en)
*Confounding factors that may affect the menstruation. (en)

*For example: stress, hormonal contraception, postnatal period, perimenopausal or HRT use, known fibroids, IUD contraception (non-hormonal) or medications. Coding with a terminology is preferred, where possible. (en)
*Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
*For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR. (en)
*Additional narrative about the menstrual cycle, not captured in other fields. (en)
Standard, uspesifisert tidspunkt eller tidsintervall som kan defineres mer eksplisitt i et templat eller i en applikasjon.
Startdato for menstruasjonsblødningen i én syklus.
For eksempel en gjennombruddsblødning eller avvik fra en typisk syklus.
En subjektiv vurdering av blødningsmengden for gjeldende syklus, relatert til typiske sykluser for individet.
Økt blødning i forhold til normalt.
Det forekom ikke blodkoagler i menstruasjonsblødningen.
Bakenforliggende faktorer som kan ha innvirkning på menstruasjonen

For eksempel: stress, Hormonell antikonsepsjon, postpartum perioden, perimenopausal eller hormonerstatningsterapi (HRT), kjente fibromyomer, intrauterin antikonsepsjon (ikke hormonell) eller medisiner. Koding med en terminologi foretrekkes der det er mulig.
Ytterligere informasjon som trengs for å kunne registrere lokalt definert innhold eller for å tilpasse til andre referansemodeller/formalismer.
For eksempel lokale informasjonsbehov eller ytterligere metadata for å kunne tilpasse til tilsvarende konsepter i FHIR.
Ytterligere fritekst om menstruasjonssyklusen som ikke er omfattet av andre felt.
Standaard, niet specifiek tijdstip of gebeurtenis die expliciet kan worden gedefinieerd in een sjabloon of runtime.
Datum van het begin van de menstruele bloeding binnen een cyclus
Duur van de menstruele bloeding tijdens deze cyclus
Verhalende beschrijving van de menstruatie cyclus.
Bijvoorbeeld bloeding halverwege de cyclus of afwijking van de gebruikelijke cyclus.
Subjectieve beschrijving van de menstruele bloeding tijdens deze cyclus, in verhouding tot gebruikelijke cycli.
Er was wel sprake van bloedproppen tijdens de menstruele bloeding.
Er was geen sprake van bloedproppen tijdens de menstruele bloeding.
Aanvullende informatie over de menstruatie cyclus.
Verstorende factoren die de menstruatie mogelijk beïnvloeden.

Bijvoorbeeld: stress, hormonale anticonceptie, postnatale periode, perimenopauze of HST-gebruik, bekende vleesbomen, spiraaltje (niet-hormonaal) of medicijnen. Indien mogelijk, vastleggen in standaard terminologie.
Extra informatie noodzakelijk om lokale inhoud vast te leggen of in lijn te zijn met andere referentie modellen.
Bijvoorbeeld: lokale informatie behoefte of aanvullende metagegevens in lijn met FHIR.
Aanvullende beschrijving over de menstruatie cyclus die niet in andere velden is vastgelegd.
